text: Ara tamra nidarsanabalira madhye rayeche, tini tomaderake pradarsana karana bidyut, bhaya o asara sancarakarupe ebam asamana theke pani nayila karena, atahpara ta diye yaminake punarjibita karena setara mrtyura para; niscaya ete bahu nidarsana rayeche emana sampradayera jan'ya, yara anudhabana kare
